summary: Slot machines, also known as fruit machines or pokies, are gambling games found in casinos. They have a screen with reels that spin when you play. Modern machines use buttons and touchscreens instead of the old lever. You can use coins, banknotes, or vouchers to play. The machine pays out when the reels show matching symbols. Slot machines are very popular and make up most of a casino's income in the US. Digital technology has made them more interactive with bonus rounds and better graphics.
title: Slot machine
